item.title: 匈牙利工业在复苏挑战中连续第九个月萎缩
item.description: 匈牙利 11 月份工业生产降幅超过预期，引发了人们对该国第四季度经济从衰退中复苏的担忧。【原文：Hungarian industrial production declined more than forecast in November, raising concerns about the country’s recovery from a recession in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 据说紫光集团计划在香港上市，筹资约 10 亿美元
item.description: 中国云计算和IT基础设施公司紫光集团（Unisplendour Corp.【原文：Chinese cloud-computing and IT infrastructure company Unisplendour Corp. is preparing for a second listing in Hong Kong as soon as this year that could raise about $1 billion, people familiar with the matter said, as mainland-listed companies make a beeline to sell shares in the city.】

item.title: 伊朗外汇网站关闭，网络攻击在中央银行争执中激增
item.description: 伊朗最受欢迎的里亚尔公开市场汇率追踪网站的管理员说，由于网络攻击和安全问题，他们在受到伊朗中央银行行长的批评后将该网站下线。【原文：Administrators of Iran’s most popular website for tracking the rial’s open-market exchange rate said they took it offline due to cyber attacks and security concerns after criticism from the head of the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 德国工业生产反弹，发出积极增长信号
item.description: 德国 11 月份的工业生产有所增长，为该国陷入困境的制造业在去年年底开始企稳带来了希望。【原文：German industrial production increased in November, offering hope that the country’s struggling manufacturing sector may have begun to stabilize toward the end of last year.】

item.title: 日本央行发出工资问题取得进展的信号，但未明确暗示加息时机
item.description: 日本央行表示，它看到了工资增长方面的进展，但没有就本月是否加息给出明确暗示。【原文：The Bank of Japan indicated it sees progress in wage gains, while refraining from giving any clear hints on whether an interest rate hike is coming this month.】

item.title: 以下是中国管理人民币的工具
item.description: 监督中国人民银行如何处理其外汇市场的 "有管理的浮动汇率 "系统并非易事。央行掌握着各种工具--有些比较透明，比如每日参考汇率，而有些则很模糊，比如中国当局可能暗中敦促银行不要在自营交易中对人民币下注。随着人民币再次接近其允许交易区间的弱势一端— 并接近离岸人民币的历史最低点，作为一种有力的【原文：Monitoring how the People’s Bank of China handles its “managed float” system for the foreign-exchange market isn’t easy. The central bank has various tools at its disposal - some are more transparent, like the daily reference rate, while others are murky, such as the potential for Chinese authorities to secretly urge banks not to bet against the yuan in proprietary trading. With the currency once again near the weak end of its allowed trading band — and close to a record low offshore as a potent】

item.title: 英镑跌至 2023 年以来最弱，英国市场普遍下挫
item.description: 由于投资者对英国财政和通胀前景的担忧使英国资产陷入低迷，英镑兑美元汇率跌至一年多来的最弱水平。【原文：The pound tumbled to its weakest level against the US dollar in more than one year as investors’ concerns over the UK fiscal and inflation outlook send the nation’s assets into a tailspin.】

item.title: Janus Henderson 在美国获胜后将 CLO 跟踪基金带到欧洲
item.description: Janus Henderson 在美国巩固了其在一个小众但利润丰厚的投资工具领域的主导地位后，正寻求在欧洲一试身手。【原文：After cementing its position as the dominant player in the US for a niche but highly lucrative investment vehicle, Janus Henderson is looking to try its luck in Europe.】

item.title: 英国生物技术初创企业瞄准减肥行业领军企业诺和诺德和礼来
item.description: 英国一家生物技术初创公司携 4.11 亿美元和前景看好的下一代减肥药进入拥挤的肥胖症药物市场。【原文：A UK biotechnology startup is entering the crowded obesity drug market, armed with $411 million and a promising next-generation weight-loss pill.】

item.title: 优衣库所有者称日本和西方市场增长强劲
item.description: 优衣库的所有者Fast Retailing Co.公布了截至11月的三个月中收入和营业利润的强劲增长，原因是日本、北美和欧洲的强劲需求帮助抵消了中国的持续放缓。【原文：Uniqlo owner Fast Retailing Co. reported strong growth in revenue and operating profit for the three months through November, as robust demand across Japan, North America and Europe helped offset sustained slowdown in China.】

item.title: 苹果公司高管在 iPhone 禁售协议出现波折后离开印尼
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，苹果公司负责与印尼谈判解除该国 iPhone 16 销售禁令的高管周三离开了雅加达，在此之前，一位部长在最后阶段的反悔破坏了协议。【原文：The Apple Inc. executive leading talks with Indonesia to lift the country’s sales ban on the iPhone 16 departed Jakarta on Wednesday, after a late stage about-face from a minister scuttled a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑逼近 1.23 美元，英国股市将上涨
埃及通胀率创两年新低，降息之路更加宽广
item.description: 埃及的通货膨胀率降至两年来的最低水平，为这个北非国家自 2020 年以来的首次降息铺平了道路。【原文：Egypt’s inflation rate slowed to its lowest level in two years, easing the path for the North African nation’s first interest-rate cut since 2020.】

item.title: 印度最新液化天然气进口终端接收首批货物
item.description: 印度最新的液化天然气终端已经接收了第一批货物，这使印度离其在本十年末将液化天然气在能源结构中的比例提高一倍的目标又近了一步。【原文：India’s newest liquefied natural gas terminal has received its first shipment, taking the country a step closer to its goal of doubling the proportion of the fuel in its energy mix by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 英镑交易狂潮显示期权市场对特鲁斯的恐惧再现
item.description: 自 2022 年英镑跌至历史最低点以来，周三是英镑期权交易最繁忙的一天，这预示着围绕英国货币的不安情绪正在加深。【原文：Wednesday was the busiest day for pound options trading since the currency slumped toward an all-time low in 2022, an omen of deepening jitters around the UK currency.】

item.title: 天然气比石油更贵为亚洲燃料转换创造条件
item.description: 液化天然气的涨势推动亚洲天然气价格罕见地大幅高于石油价格，为主要消费者转向使用更便宜但更脏的燃料铺平了道路。【原文：A rally in liquefied natural gas has pushed Asian prices to a rare and substantial premium over oil, paving the way for major consumers to shift to cheaper but dirtier fuels.】

item.title: 香港机场通过多币种债券销售融资 70 亿美元
item.description: 香港机场管理局在本周内出售了约 70 亿美元的三种货币债券，这是香港公司发行的最大规模的多种货币债券之一。【原文：The Airport Authority of Hong Kong sold around $7 billion of bonds in three currencies over the course of the week, in one of the largest multi-currency offerings by a Hong Kong company.】

item.title: 为什么世界大国都在争夺计算机芯片？
item.description: 计算机芯片是数字经济的引擎，其不断增长的功能使生成式人工智能等技术成为可能，有望改变多个行业。冠状病毒大流行扰乱了亚洲的芯片生产，使全球技术供应链陷入混乱，凸显了芯片的关键作用。【原文：Computer chips are the engine of the digital economy, and their growing capabilities are enabling technologies such as generative artificial intelligence that promise to transform multiple industries. Their critical role was highlighted when the coronavirus pandemic disrupted chip production in Asia, tipping global technology supply chains into chaos.】

item.title: 中国将继续利用煤炭满足能源安全需求
item.description: 据中国最高级别的行业组织称，廉价煤炭将在未来一年继续为中国的能源安全提供压舱石。【原文：Cheap coal will continue to provide the ballast for China’s energy security in the coming year, according to the country’s top industry grouping.】

item.title: 基金在财报发布前大举做空印度股票期货
item.description: 就在财报季即将开始之际，海外投资者对印度股指期货的看跌程度达到了七个月来的最高点。【原文：Overseas investors have turned the most bearish on Indian stock index futures in seven months just as the earnings seasons is about to start.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长西波罗内告诉 Corriere：对通胀的忧虑可能有害
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员皮埃罗-西波罗内（Piero Cipollone）在接受《晚邮报》采访时说，过度担忧未来可能出现的通胀冲击会对经济造成损害。【原文：Excessive concern about possible future inflation shocks can be harmful to the economy, European Central Bank Executive Board member Piero Cipollone told Corriere della Sera in an interview.】

item.title: 吉尔兹债券收益率飙升，对特鲁斯续集的担忧也随之而来
item.description:
全球债券市场的变动已经蒸发了英国的预算缓冲，使得削减开支的可能性更大。【原文：

The global move in bonds has already vaporized the UK’s budget buffer, making spending cuts even more likely.

】

item.title: 英国债券动荡唤起人们对 1976 年债务危机的记忆
item.description: 英国最近的债券动荡与 2022 年的利兹-特拉斯小型预算案（Liz Truss mini-budget debacle）相提并论，但将其与 20 世纪 70 年代的债务危机相提并论可能更为恰当。【原文：Britain’s latest bond turmoil has drawn comparisons with the Liz Truss mini-budget debacle of 2022 but a parallel with the debt crisis of the 1970s might be more apt.】

item.title: 希腊科佩卢佐预计 2030 年开始与埃及电力联网
item.description: 希腊 Copelouzos 集团负责该项目的高管表示，该集团正在加快开发价值 42 亿欧元（43 亿美元）的与埃及的电力连接项目，希望明年能做出最终投资决定，并于 2030 年启动该项目。【原文：Greece’s Copelouzos Group is speeding up development of its €4.2 billion ($4.3 billion) power link with Egypt, looking to reach a final investment decision next year and its startup in 2030, the executive in charge of the project said.】

item.title: 麦格理称，印尼镍矿开采可能使全球供应量减少 35
item.description: 据麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）称，印尼镍矿产量的潜在削减可能会使全球三分之一以上的供应量退出市场，从而给价格带来巨大的上行风险。【原文：Potential cuts to Indonesian nickel mine output could remove more than a third of global supply from the market, according to Macquarie Group Ltd., presenting a significant upside risk to prices.】

item.title: 拉菲兹称马来西亚汽油补贴改革已进入最后阶段
item.description: 马来西亚经济部即将向内阁提交一份关于收入分类的新提案，该提案将允许马来西亚停止向最富有的 15%的人提供汽油补贴。【原文：Malaysia’s economy ministry is close to presenting to the cabinet a new proposal on income classification that would allow the nation to end petrol subsidies for the wealthiest 15%.】

item.title: 中国疾病控制机构检测到新的麻风腮病菌群
item.description: 世界卫生组织去年宣布非洲疫情为新的全球紧急卫生事件后，该病原体蔓延到了更多地区。【原文：China has detected the new mutated strain of the mpox virus, as the pathogen spreads to more geographies after the World Health Organization declared the outbreak in Africa a new global health emergency last year.】

item.title: 中国称欧盟外国补贴法构成贸易壁垒
item.description: 中国称，欧盟为保护本国公司免受外国补贴而采取的措施是贸易和投资障碍，这是双方持续贸易争端中的最新冲突。【原文：China said the European Union’s measures to shield its companies from foreign subsidies are a barrier to trade and investment, marking the latest clash in the ongoing trade dispute between the two sides.】

item.title: FTX 质疑向前雇员出售欧盟资产的交易是否已完成
item.description: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德（Sam Bankman-Fried）的前加密货币企业欧洲分部归谁所有的问题似乎已经尘埃落定：总部位于迪拜的背包交易所（Backpack Exchange）表示，经过几个月的争论，它已经收购了 FTX EU。【原文：The question of who owns the European unit of Sam Bankman-Fried’s former crypto enterprise appeared to be settled: Dubai-based Backpack Exchange said it had purchased FTX EU after months of wrangling.】

item.title: 汇丰银行分析师认为香港上市中资股有 21% 的上涨空间
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）转而看好在香港上市的中国股票，称它们是中国大陆 "更有利的政策言论 "和国内经济更好前景的受益者。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is turning bullish on Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong, touting them as beneficiaries of more “favorable policy rhetoric” in mainland China and a better outlook for the domestic economy.】
